title: Neuroscientists find brain pathway supporting an intersection of taste and pain

title_detail.value: Neuroscientists find brain pathway supporting an intersection of taste and pain

summary: Neuroscientists have found a pathway in the brain where taste and pain intersect in a new study that originally was designed to look at the intersection of taste and food temperature. This study was the first time researchers have shown that taste and pain signals come together in the brain and use the same circuitry.
